mapper.select: select sum(oi.product_price) as totalPrice, c.name from product p right join order_item oi on oi.product_id = p.id left join category c on p.category_id = c.id left join orders o on oi.order_id = o.id where o.state != 1 and o.state != 5 group by c.name order by total_price desc limit 0,5
